name: 2223Y1C-Team 6Meier_Sid Meier's Frogs
description:
Sid Meier's Frogs

A platformer where you play as the heavy Frog Queen! Make your way through caves, making deliberate jumps, playing with momentum & fun level mechanics in order to find your king!

Created by: 

Genna Khudilaynen

Neil Iakini

Davide Perdon

Elisah Rutten

Main Menu Song by ArtNoux

Main Menu image from Civilization VI

Background:

This is a Year 1 student project, where the team was tasked with creating a side-scrolling platformer with limited art. Out of the available constraints, our team chose to deliver a "Heavy, deliberate and momentum-based" player experience, which inspired the heavy frog player character. 

Controls: Keyboard/Mouse Controller Pause ESC Start Reset R Full Playthrough: Known issues:

(If you get stuck, press R to go back to the last checkpoint

  • No controller menu support.
  • Lighting build error in first level.
  • Small chance to get stuck on jump pads.
  • Moving objects might stop moving occasionally.
  • Breakable platforms are not always destroyed when landing on edge.
  • Moving Platforms' paths sometimes disappear.
